channel.title: new house in da house on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in new house in da house on Barefoot Rob

item.title: bank loan for house is approved!
item.description: 13:10 Wednesday 20 January 2016 JST Ma! We found a nice house in 新百合ケ丘 which is close enough to Tokyo to work, and safe from tsunamis next time they come. The house is near the bottom of a hill, but it's still high enough to be safe hahaha. It has a cute sunroom for Mama and double windows for insulation everywhere else! Super excited!
